column4: Hello, i set one of my folder's permission access to none, how can i turn it back to normal?
Do you know how to use the "chmod" command? That's what you need if you do it at the command line.
no, can you please explain to me how to do it?
Well if you're not familiar, an easier way is to open up your Nautilus file browser, right-click the file, click "properties", and then go to the "permisssions" tab.
